thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Rob Corrigan
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Rob Corrigan

author: Rob Corrigan
title: Rob Corrigan
text:
Having used Easy Signs services once before, we needed to replicate a previous order in a greater quantity - so we knew what we would be getting and the price which satisfied our needs.
The Easy Signs team were very quick to respond to queries, to issue proofs and to update us on production status.
Unfortunately the use of StarTrack for delivery resulted in a delayed delivery due to incorrect address and a lack of communication, but that isn't necessarily Easy Signs fault.
